name: ChecktheCambridgerowingflagstatus
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: check the flag
des: This skill returns the flag color (green, yellow, red, not operational) from https://www.cucbc.org/flag. The color is set by the Cambridge University Combined Boat Clubs (CUCBC) for rowing conditions in Cambridge, UK based on current/forecasted weather conditions. Crews are restricted on yellow and red flags.
